vendor_name: Cayo Exclusive Resort & Spa
title: Crete Private Pool Tranquil Oasis with Stunning Ocean Views, Daily Breakfast & Nightly Dinner
description: Immerse yourself in an island explorer’s dream at Crete's Cayo Exclusive Resort & Spa, in the picturesque village of Plaka and overlooking Spinalonga Island. Nearby to popular tourist spot, Elounda, you'll find uninterrupted bliss within moments as you unwind beside the glimmering split-level infinity pool with a cocktail in hand, or uncover new levels of rejuvenation with a tailored treatment at Armonia Spa. Relish gastronomic greatness served up daily at the resort’s onsite eateries against a picture-perfect classic Greek island backdrop to round out the perfect day in paradise.

vendor_name: Elounda Mare Relais & Châteaux Hotel
title: World-Renowned Relais & Châteaux Beachfront Luxury with Gourmet Dining
description:
Escape to the sun-soaked Greek island of Crete staying at the Elounda Mare Hotel, complete with its own beautiful cove and private beach. Scattered across the hillside Elounda cove, overlooking the turquoise bay below, this stunning hotel is part of the world-renowned French Relais & Châteaux collection.

Stay in a Seaview Twin Room with daily breakfast, a dinner for two, a welcome drink on arrival, discounted treatments at Six Senses Spa and use of the hotel’s fitness room, sauna and steam room.

**Travelling to Europe?** [Browse our Europe Collection](https://luxuryescapes.com/au/destinations/europe).

vendor_name: The Royal Blue Resort & Spa Crete
title: Five-Star Greek Island Escape with Daily Dining Inclusions
description: The idyllic Greek island of Crete is calling, answer in style with a stay at the glamorous The Royal Blue Resort, one of the finest five-star resorts on the island. Treat yourself to a sun-kissed holiday in this luxurious haven, complete with its very own private bay, and enjoy daily breakfast, nightly buffet dinner, a refreshing welcome drink on arrival, local pastries in your room and a Thalassotherapy treatment per person at the on-site spa.

vendor_name: The Royal Blue Resort & Spa Crete
title: Crete Oceanfront Luxury with Daily Breakfast, Nightly Dinner & Spa Credit
description:
Crete is calling... answer in style with a glamorous stay at one of the finest five-star resorts on the famed Greek island. Spectacularly located on a hillside, the resort covers over 70 acres of perfectly kept gardens and offers guests access to an exclusive private beach with all the creature comforts, including sunbeds and umbrellas.

Spend your time lazing by the main pools, which offer breathtaking views over the sea, practising your serve on the two tennis courts, being pampered at the blissful spa and wining and dining at eight restaurants and bars.

Set among lush gardens above sparkling blue waters, The Royal Blue Resort & Spa lies on the northern coast of Crete next to the quaint fishing village of Panormos. This picturesque village will give you a true taste of life on the island: picture cobbled streets lined with boutique shops and Greek tavernas surrounded by tiny coves with sandy beaches.

vendor_name: The Royal Senses Resort & Spa, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Extended by Popular Demand: Crete Luxury Oasis with Daily Breakfast & Nightly Dinner
description:
Find Greek island paradise at this contemporary oasis perched along Crete's sparkling northern coast. With a stunning modern design, seven bars and restaurants and six pools, this heavenly resort encourages guests to reconnect and rejuvenate while surrounded by the natural splendour of Crete's remarkable landscape.

Reinvigorate your body and mind at Pure Senses Spa or find a new type of bliss at one of the dreamy pools. Relax under the setting sun with a cocktail in hand at Euphoria Pool Bar while the kids are entertained at the Splash Aqua Park or kids' club. When hunger strikes, sample traditional Greek dishes at Mitato, hearty gyros at Platia or seasonal ingredients at Gea.
location_description: The Royal Senses Resort & Spa Crete, Curio Collection by Hilton

vendor_name: Endless Blue Resort / Akoya Resort
title: All-Inclusive Greek Island Escape
description: Newly opened and ideally located on the largest of the Greek islands, Endless Blue Resort sits just 700 metres from the sparkling shores of the Sea of Crete, boasting an unbeatable sunset view. Soak up island life with an all-inclusive getaway including daily buffet breakfast and lunches, nightly buffet dinners, free-flow alcoholic drinks with lunch and dinner, and an unlimited a la carte snack menu at the Pool Bar. Plus, all government taxes are included in the package.

vendor_name: Golden Rose Suites
title: Greek Island Suite Getaway
description: Picture yourself relaxing on a white sandy beach as the Mediterranean stretches on endlessly in front of you. It’s time to make that dream a reality and start planning a European summer getaway on the stunning Greek island of Crete. Rent a car and make the most of this incredible island escape, with a peaceful stay at Golden Rose Suites, where you will enjoy daily breakfast, nightly dinner and a welcome bottle of local wine. Plus, all government taxes are included!

vendor_name: Cayo Exclusive Resort & Spa
title: Crete Private Pool Oasis with Daily Breakfast & Nightly Dinners
description:
Immerse yourself in an island explorer’s dream at Cayo Exclusive Resort & Spa, nearby the picturesque village of Plaka overlooking Spinalonga Island and the popular tourist spot; Elounda. Find uninterrupted bliss within moments as you while lazing beside the glimmering split-level infinity pool with a cocktail in hand, or uncover new levels of rejuvenation with a tailored treatment at Armonia Spa. Relish gastronomic greatness served up daily at the resort’s onsite eateries against a picture-perfect classic Greek Island backdrop to round out the perfect day in paradise.

Venture beyond the resort and dive deep into the vibrant Cretan culture and take a walk around the nearby white-sand beaches or verdant mountains, and lively villages practically on the resort’s doorstep or hop on over the UNESCO World Heritage-listed Spinalonga Island.

vendor_name: The Royal Senses Resort & Spa, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Crete Curio Collection by Hilton Clifftop Luxury with Daily Breakfast, Nightly Dinner & Spa Credit
description:
Find Greek island paradise at this clifftop retreat perched on the Crete's sparkling northern coast. With a stunning design, seven bars and restaurants and four incredible pools, this ultra-luxurious resort encourages guests to reconnect and re-energise while surrounded by the natural splendour of the remarkable Cretan landscape. Reinvigorate body and mind at Pure Senses Spa, find a new type of bliss with the collection of pools, or relax under the setting sun with a curated cocktail in hand at the stunning Euphoria pool bar.

When hunger strikes, sample delicious traditional Cretan dishes with a focus on premium lamb at Mitato, bite into a hearty gyros at Platia or harvest your own fruit and vegetables at the family farm before tasting your hard work at the glorious GEA restaurant. Fun for all ages awaits at the Kids' Club and Aqua Splash Park, providing entertainment for hours on end.
location_description: The Royal Senses Resort & Spa Crete, Curio Collection by Hilton

vendor_name: Wyndham Grand Crete Mirabello Bay
title: Blissful Five-Star Crete Retreat overlooking Mirabello Bay with Daily Breakfast & Dinner
description:
Experience Greek island sophistication at the five-star Wyndham Grand Crete Mirabello Bay - a luxuriously modern oasis enviably nestled on one of Crete's most beautiful seafronts. Set against a backdrop of verdant hills and glistening Cretan sea vistas, Wyndham Grand Crete Mirabello Bay promises unspoiled natural beauty and first-class facilities. Explore 10 exceptional onsite restaurants and bars, two swimming pools, an indulgent spa with sauna and steam room, and the resort's private beach. Whether you want to while away days on the sun-kissed sands, transcend bliss with a heavenly massage or treat yourself to exceptional authentic cuisine - this ultra-luxe haven caters to everyone's version of paradise.

Located only a 10-minute drive from the popular coastal town of Agios Nikolaos, Wyndham Grand Crete Mirabello Bay sits within easy reach of Crete's top attractions. Explore the northside's fascinating archaeological sites and shopping meccas or escape to the southside, where quaint seaside villages and pristine beaches await.

**Your handpicked inclusions:**

- Start each morning with a delicious buffet breakfast at Sirens restaurant
- Indulge with delicious nightly dinner at Sirens restaurant
- Toast your escape with one drink per person, per stay, at one of the resort's five bars
- Unwind with a one-time rejuvenating 15-minute massage per adult
- Relax with unlimited access to Mirabello Spa facilities throughout your stay
- One child (11 and under) stays free with breakfast.

**Pool Access Upgrade:** Enjoy access to a shared infinity pool and sun-drenched terrace overlooking the bay when you upgrade.

**Book with 100% Confidence:** If for whatever reason you don’t want to go on your holiday, you can cancel right up to 14 days before check-in and get a 100% credit to use at Luxury Escapes for any other accommodation offer. Excludes flights, see the Fine Print for details.

vendor_name: The Royal Blue Resort & Spa Crete

vendor_name: The Royal Senses Resort & Spa, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Award-Winning Crete Seaside Sanctuary with Spa Credit, Daily Breakfast & Nightly Dinner
description:
Find Greek island paradise at The Royal Senses Resort and Spa Crete, an idyllic luxury resort from Curio Collection by Hilton perched on the island's northern coast. With award-winning design that prioritises both togetherness and quiet relaxation, reconnect and re-energise while surrounded by the natural splendour of the remarkable Cretan countryside.

Recline in luxury within stylish and sophisticated guest rooms and suites boasting ocean views and sophisticated design elements. Reinvigorate your body and mind at the Pure Senses Spa, or find a new type of bliss by the collection of four pools, curated cocktail in hand. location_description: The Royal Senses Resort & Spa Crete, Curio Collection by Hilton

vendor_name: LUX ME White Palace
title: Iconic Grecotel All-Inclusive Crete Luxury with Unlimited Drinks & Guaranteed Sea View Upgrade
description:
Discover the opulence of the Mediterranean with a stay at the Grecotel LuxMe White Palace, a five-star haven nestled on the azure shores of Crete. This all-inclusive resort offers sensational, panoramic views of the coast, which can be enjoyed right throughout the resort, including from the comfort of your room. Savour an array of gastronomic delights at the hotel's exquisite dining venues, including The White restaurant, where the views provide the perfect backdrop to the French, Italian and Greek fine dining on offer. For the freshest seafood paired with sparkling wine, look no further than Lobsteria restaurant, with its stunning terrace for dinner under the stars.

As the Cretan sun shines bright, explore the island's rich history, charming villages and vibrant markets. The island is home to some spectacular beaches, spanning every inch of the rugged coastal landscape, including Platanes Beach and the resort's Blue Flag beach. Enjoy the luxuries of 22 resort pools, or take in a therapeutic treatment at the onsite Hippie Spa to completely unwind on your Crete vacation.

vendor_name: Grecotel Creta Palace
title: Crete Greek Island Beachfront Paradise with Daily Breakfast, Nightly Dinner & Kids Stay Free
description:
Embrace sophisticated Greek hospitality at the five-star Grecotel Creta Palace, located on a stretch of Crete's silky-white sand. With the turquoise ocean on its doorstep, this magnificent resort is a sunshine-filled paradise boasting traditional whitewashed buildings made to mimic a Greek island town - complete with a village square, a church and an authentic cafe - alongside verdant gardens and glistening pools. Spend hours exploring this haven, with fun-in-the-sun activities perfect for families seeking a relaxing getaway. Little ones can splash in the children's pool or race down the waterslides while adults indulge at one of the nine onsite eateries and bars.

Dig into lavish buffet bites at Labyrinth Atrium Restaurant or sip cocktails adjacent to soft sands at Careta Careta Beach Bar. When it's time for relaxation, rejuvenating treatments await at Elixir Beauty Spa, complete with a hydromassage, indoor whirlpool and sauna.

vendor_name: Caramel, A Grecotel Resort to Live
title: Boutique Crete Beachfront Escape with Daily Breakfast, Nightly Dinner & Kids Stay Free
description:
Unravel the rich tapestry of sundrenched beaches, ancient treasures and vibrant landscapes that colour the Cretan Riviera with a stay at this boutique and glamorously eccentric retreat. Picturesquely set on Crete’s longest beachfront, this stunning resort will revive you with long days spent curled up under an umbrella on the caramel beachfront, or on a cosy bed poolside. Embrace Crete island life with plush emerald velvet sofas in the lobby-cum-agora, a slick bar with rich velvet armchairs, a wellness and fitness centre to revitalise the senses and a 300-metre-long stretch of sand overlooking the open sea.

Watch as Cretan chefs create gourmet buffets full of traditional produce, paired with herbal teas, at Caramel the Restaurant, savour your favourite cocktail in the sophisticated Panther Lobby Bar or experience a unique garden-to-table experience at Agreco Farm. Discover why the spectacular landscape - white sandy beaches, sapphire waters, craggy mountains, cliffs and gorges - typically Grecian architecture and richly mythologised history have kept travellers flocking to this Mediterranean paradise time and time again.
offer_address: Adele Rethymno, Adelianos Kampos, Crete 74100, Greece

vendor_name: Daios Cove Luxury Resort & Villas
title: Private Cove Luxury in Crete with Daily Dining
description:
Escape to the sun-soaked Greek island of Crete, staying at the five-star Daios Cove Luxury Resort & Villas, complete with its own beautiful private beach. Nestled in a natural amphitheatre that looks out onto the sparkling Mediterranean, you’ll fall in love with Greece over four-nights in a Deluxe Seaview Room with daily buffet breakfast, nightly buffet dinner or nightly €30 dine-around credit per adult to use at any of the six onsite restaurants, a welcome drink on arrival, a bottle of premium local wine, a signature cocktail each, €80 credit per room to use at any onsite outlet and two 30-minute spa access passes per adult.

**Upgrade** to the Junior Suite or Junior Suite with Pool to recieve access to the "Residents Club", an all-inclusive fine dining experience. You'll be treated to daily buffet breakfast, and three-course lunch and dinner at your choice of any on-site restaurant, a daily replenished mini bar with alcoholic drinks and more!

vendor_name: Numo Ierapetra Beach Resort - Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Crete Adults-Only Beachside Luxury with Daily Dining & Welcome Cocktails
description:
The adults-only Numo Ierapetra Beach Resort offers barefoot luxury in the most sought-after enclave of Crete. Kissed by sunshine, embraced by gently swaying tamarisk trees and surrounded by endless views of the dazzling Mediterranean Sea, this seaside haven is perfectly placed for exploring the Greek Island's southern coast. Splash in sky-blue waters on Crete’s longest beach, explore Ottoman-era alleyways and fountains in Ierapetra’s Old Town and savour the region’s stunningly soulful scenery. By night, sample the resort's restaurants and bars: Menoa for sumptuous Cretan plates, Mare Mare bar for ice-cold poolside ouzo and Tamarisk for fresh fish.

Ready to explore? Eat, drink and dance the night away across Ierapetra's many tavernas and bars, uncover underwater kingdoms at The Reef @ Numo or admire each glorious Cretan sunset from any of the region’s rugged hilltops. Chrysi Island's tremendously blue waters and idyllic golden sands are a short boat ride away, for those looking for further adventure.
location_description: Numo Ierapetra Beach Resort Crete, Curio Collection by Hilton
offer_address: Epar.Od. Ierapetras - Sitias, Ierapetra 722 00, Crete, Greece

vendor_name: Elounda Peninsula All Suite Hotel

Home to the largest seafront pool on the island, you can discover true waterfront serenity staying in your own private suite with daily breakfast, a three-course dining experience to have at your choice of eight restaurants, 20% off pre-booked spa treatments and more.

vendor_name: Elounda Gulf Villas
title: Elegant Crete Oceanfront Suites & Pool Villas with Daily Breakfast, Nightly Dinner & Massages
description:
Part of the Small Luxury Hotels of the World, these gorgeous clifftop Mediterranean suites and villas promise boutique elegance high above the shimmering waters of Mirabello Bay. With each space boasting unrivalled privacy and breathtaking views over Crete, it's the perfect way to soak up the island's natural splendour.

Spend quality time being pampered at Elixir Spa, or bond with the whole family over farm-to-table cuisine at Argo Restaurant. Savour craft cocktails and fresh coffee at Argo Lounge Bar, or head out on the complimentary shuttle to the resort's own private beach club, boasting some of the island's most swimmable waters, perfect for watersports or seaside drinks.
offer_address: Μesa Pigadakia, Schisma Eloundas, Elounda 720 53, Greece

vendor_name: The Royal Senses Resort & Spa, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Mystic Crete Oceanfront Luxury with Daily Breakfast, Nightly Dinner plus Kids Stay & Eat Free
description:
Get swept away on your own Greek odyssey at The Royal Senses Resort & Spa, Curio Collection by Hilton, an luxury resort perched on Crete's northern coast that feels of another planet. Enjoy an award-winning design that prioritises both togetherness and quiet relaxation, with claim to a private beach, relaxing spa and seven high-end drinking and dining spaces. Greet every day with the bounty of a Mediterranean village-style harvest, sharing in the hotel's communal breakfast overlooking the sea, then return each night for dinner feasting and sunset views. A rich and wholesome stay for all, children 17 and under always stay and eat free.

Recline in stylish guest rooms and suites boasting ocean views and sophisticated design elements. Reinvigorate your body and mind at the Pure Senses Spa, or find a new type of bliss as you relax beside one of four pools, curated cocktail in hand. Harvest your own produce at the family farm before tasting your fruits of labour at GEA Restaurant. Or if more fun is needed, the kids' club and Aqua Splash Park provide entertainment for hours.
location_description: The Royal Senses Resort & Spa Crete, Curio Collection by Hilton

vendor_name: The Royal Blue Resort & Spa Crete
title: Crete Oceanfront Bliss with Daily Breakfast, Nightly Dinner & Resort Credit
description:
Crete is calling… answer in style with a glamorous stay at one of the finest five-star resorts on the famed Greek island. Spectacularly located on a hillside, The Royal Blue Resort & Spa covers over 70 acres of perfectly kept gardens and offers access to a private beach with sunbeds and umbrellas.

Spend your time lazing by the main pools, which offer breathtaking views over the Aegean Sea, practising your serve on the tennis courts, being pampered at the blissful spa or wining and dining at one of seven restaurants and bars, including the locally inspired Symposium.

Set among lush gardens above sparkling blue waters, this island escape lies on Crete’s northern coast, near the quaint village of Panormos. Visit for a true taste of island life, with cobbled streets lined with boutique shops and Greek tavernas in tiny coves.

vendor_name: JW Marriott Resort & Spa, Crete
title: Grand Opening: Greek Island Hideaway with Daily Breakfast, Nightly Drinks & EUR100 Dining Credit
description:
Ascend to Greek deity status at JW Marriott Crete Resort & Spa, a private sanctuary tucked away in an intimate cove with jaw-dropping sea views that stretch to the horizon. Here, five-star rooms and suites flow seamlessly into untamed natural beauty, creating a retreat where time stands still and worries melt away.

Dive into one of three spectacular pools or unwind at the world-class Anoseas Spa, while the healing energy of Crete's ancient landscape wraps around you like a warm embrace. Indulge your senses across six exceptional dining and drinking venues that showcase the vibrant flavours of Mediterranean cuisine against a backdrop of Aegean blues.

This resort's holistic approach to wellbeing draws inspiration from Cretan traditions, infusing your stay with the island's powerful, humbling energy that flows through the stunning terrain. Whether relishing in your balcony views or wandering through the nature-enveloped grounds, this secluded haven is a true escape from ordinary life.

vendor_name: Esperides Resort Crete, The Authentic Experience
title: Crete Five-Star Village-Inspired Escape with All-Inclusive Dining
description:
The sapphire waters and pristine sandy beaches of Crete repeatedly top bucket lists around the world - and you can tick them off in style with a five-star stay at Esperides Resort Crete, The Authentic Experience. The resort sits in the heart of the idyllic Hersonissos region, renowned for its spectacular landscape, undulating hills that tower above the town, fascinating archaeological sites, beaches and nightlife.

The resort offers a soothing, village-inspired ambience that embodies the warm hospitality Crete is known for. Locally inspired architecture is set against perfectly manicured gardens and recently renovated facilities, including four gleaming pools and an open-air gym, creating an alluring charm that ensures a memorable stay. Foodies will be delighted by four exceptional dining venues: a Mediterranean buffet at Natura, Monastery Cretan Eatery, serving traditional fare in an authentic setting, Luna Rossa Italian Restaurant and the Asian A La Carte Restaurant, for those who wish to embark on a culinary journey.
location_description: Esperides Resort Crete, The Authentic Experience
offer_address: Costa Varnali street, Koutouloufari, Hersonissos, 70014, Crete Greece

vendor_name: The Royal Blue Resort & Spa Crete
title: Crete Five-Star Greek Island Luxury with Daily Buffet Breakfast & Nightly Dinner
description:
Crete is calling: answer in style with a glamorous Greek island stay at The Royal Blue Resort & Spa, perched spectacularly hillside on the island's sun-kissed northern coast. Covering over 70 acres of perfectly kept gardens and offering guests access to an exclusive private beach, the resort offers the coastal escape of your dreams. Spend your days lazing by the main pools - each offering breathtaking views over the shimmering Sea of Crete - or embark on a culinary journey across the resort's world-class restaurants and bars, including authentic Cretan banquet house Symposium and starlit seafood venue Asterias.

The Royal Blue Resort & Spa lies just moments from the ancient fishing village of Panormos, famed for its beaches, quaintly cobbled streets, Greek tavernas and hidden coves. There's plenty more to explore nearby, including the renowned Matala Beach and a wealth of hiking and historic highlights in the island's lush mountains.

vendor_name: Creta Maris Resort
title: Greece Five-Star Crete Beachfront Escape with All-Inclusive Dining & Drinks
description:
Escape to the sun-kissed Greek Islands and let your worries melt away at the all-inclusive Creta Maris Resort. Perfectly positioned on Crete's golden shores, Creta Maris Resort ensures that your toughest decision each day will be how to spend your time. Take a refreshing dip in any of the 10 outdoor swimming pools or enjoy some family time at one of the five children's pools. Kids will revel in hours of fun in the Mediterranean sun at the sprawling onsite waterpark, while adults will find rejuvenation at the soothing onsite spa - a relaxing sanctuary with a hammam, sauna and hydrotherapy. Dine across seven restaurants serving up mouthwatering dishes or enjoy a refreshing cocktail at one of the resort's 10 bars.

Laidback vacationers will love lounging on the pristine sands of the resort's blue flag beach, while active guests are sure to love the seemingly endless watersports and outdoor recreation facilities on offer. In the evening, round out the day with a visit to Cine Creta Maris, one of Europe's largest open-air cinemas, for a relaxing movie under the stars.

vendor_name: Amirandes, A Grecotel Resort to Live
title: Five-Star Crete Greek Island Beachfront Elegance with Daily Breakfast & Nightly Dinner
description:
The Greek island of Crete beckons with a stay at the luxurious Amirandes Grecotel Boutique Resort, a five-star beachfront haven offering everything you need to savour time spent in sun-soaked paradise. Days are full of energetic outdoor recreation - including tennis, watersports and mountain biking (additional charges apply) and time spent at the resort's spectacular private beach - while evenings feature live music and magnificent sunsets. Browse through the onsite designer boutiques surrounding the shimmering central lagoon before indulging in a decadent feast at any of the nine onsite restaurants, bars and lounges.

Marvel at the classic Grecian architecture surrounding the resort or take in the historic white-washed churches in the nearby village of Gouves. Explore the vibrant waterfront restaurants and shops or take a trip further afield to ancient ruins and archaeological museums, ideal for learning about the rich history of this Mediterranean paradise.

vendor_name: Elounda Peninsula All Suite Hotel
title: Greek Island Luxury by the Sea with Exquisite Dining & Spa Discounts
description: Leave the world behind and escape to the Greek Island of Crete for a high-end stay at the glamorous Elounda Peninsula, All Suite Hotel. Home to the largest seafront pool on the island, you can discover true waterfront serenity staying in your own private suite with daily breakfast, a three-course dining experience to have at your choice of eight restaurants, a welcome drink on arrival and a welcome amenity in your room and 20% discount on spa treatments booked prior to arrival at the hotel. title: Five-Star Greek Island Getaway with Nightly Dinners
description: Ancient Greece meets contemporary luxury at the five-star Porto Elounda Golf & Spa Resort in Crete’s beautiful Elounda region. Indulge in a sun-soaked escape in the Greek islands and let your worries slip away with five or seven nights of beachfront bliss. Includes daily buffet breakfast, nightly buffet dinners, a welcome drink on arrival, 20% discount at the serene Six Senses Spa and more.

The adults-only Numo Ierapetra Beach Resort Crete, Curio Collection by Hilton offers barefoot luxury in the most sought-after enclave of Crete. Kissed by sunshine, embraced by gently swaying tamarisk trees and surrounded by endless views of the dazzling Mediterranean Sea, this extraordinary stay offers one-of-a-kind seaside serenity elevated by an island-inspired modernist design and backed by Hilton's signature hospitality. Return from days in the sun and sample the resort's exquisite collection of resorts and bars: Menoa for sumptuous Peruvian-Asian-inspired dishes, Mare Mare bar for ice-cold poolside ouzo and Tamarisk for fresh fish.

This haven is perfectly placed for exploring the Greek island's southern coast. Splash in sky-blue waters on Crete’s longest beach, explore Ottoman-era alleyways and fountains in Ierapetra’s Old Town and soak up the region’s stunningly soulful scenery.

vendor_name: Amirandes, A Grecotel Resort to Live
title: Crete All-Inclusive Beachfront Elegance with Unlimited Free-Flow Drinks & Return Private Transfers
description:
The Greek island of Crete beckons with a stay at this luxurious resort, a five-star beachfront haven in sun-soaked paradise. Days are full of energetic outdoor recreation - including tennis, watersports and time spent at the resort's spectacular private beach - while evenings feature live music and magnificent sunsets. 

Browse through the onsite designer boutiques surrounding the shimmering central lagoon before indulging in a decadent feast at one of the many onsite restaurants, bars and lounges.

Marvel at the classic Grecian architecture surrounding the resort or take in the historic white-washed churches in the nearby village of Gouves. vendor_name: The Royal Senses Resort & Spa, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Greek Island Paradise: Crete Luxury Oasis with Daily Breakfast & Nightly Dinner
description:
Find Greek island paradise at this contemporary oasis perched along Crete's sparkling northern coast. With a stunning modern design, seven bars and restaurants and six pools, this heavenly resort encourages guests to reconnect and rejuvenate while surrounded by the natural splendour of Crete's remarkable landscape.

Reinvigorate your body and mind at Pure Senses Spa or find a new type of bliss at one of the dreamy pools. Relax under the setting sun with a cocktail in hand at Euphoria Pool Bar while the kids are entertained at the Splash Aqua Park or kids' club. When hunger strikes, sample traditional Greek dishes at MITATO, hearty gyros at PLATIA, or seasonal ingredients at GEA.

vendor_name: Caramel, A Grecotel Resort to Live
title: Boutique Greek Island Suites with Daily Buffet Breakfast and Dinner
description: Unravel the rich tapestry of sundrenched beaches, ancient treasures and vibrant landscapes of the Cretan Riviera with four nights of boutique indulgence at the glamorously eccentric Caramel Grecotel Boutique Resort. Picturesquely set on Crete’s longest beachfront, this luxurious all-suite retreat will pamper you with long days spent curled up under an umbrella on the caramel beachfront, or on a lilypad sunlounger poolside. Embrace Crete island life with daily buffet breakfast, nightly buffet dinner, a welcome drink each, a bottle of wine and fruit in your room when you arrive and all government taxes included.
offer_address: Adele Rethymno, Adelianos Kampos, Crete 74100, Greece

vendor_name: Wyndham Grand Crete Mirabello Bay
title: All-Inclusive Five-Star Crete Retreat Overlooking Mirabello Bay with Free-Flow Drinks
description:
Experience Greek island sophistication at the five-star Wyndham Grand Crete Mirabello Bay - a modern oasis nestled on one of Crete's most beautiful seafronts. Set against a backdrop of the verdant Lassithi hills and glistening Cretan Sea, this sophisticated beachfront retreat promises unspoiled natural beauty and first-class facilities. With all-inclusive dining as part of your package, you'll enjoy fresh Mediterranean plates at Amalthea Main Restaurant. Also onsite are eight other top-tier restaurants and bars, two swimming pools, an indulgent spa, and a slice of private beach.

Located only a 10-minute drive from the popular coastal town of Agios Nikolaos, Wyndham Grand Crete Mirabello Bay sits within easy reach of Crete's top attractions. Explore fascinating archaeological sites and shopping meccas or escape to quaint seaside villages and pristine beaches.

vendor_name: La Mer Resort & Spa - Adults Only
title: Adults-Only Crete Island Luxury with Daily Breakfast, Nightly Dinner & Oceanfront Infinity Pool
description:
Stay at Crete’s crown jewel of luxury and immerse yourself in the serene elegance of this exclusive adults-only retreat. Just moments from the sparkling Aegean Sea, indulge in breathtaking views and world-class comforts, from exquisite Mediterranean cuisine at two gourmet restaurants to serene freshwater pools and a world-class spa with a tranquil indoor pool.

Perfectly positioned between Chania and Rethymno, La Mer offers personalised service, refined aesthetics and year-round indulgence. Whether you dream of a romantic escape, a fairytale wedding or pure relaxation, experience the pinnacle of sophistication and well-being at Crete’s most enchanting resort.

vendor_name: The Royal Blue Resort & Spa Crete
title: Crete Five-Star Greek Island Luxury with Daily Buffet Breakfast & Nightly Dinners
description:
The idyllic Greek island of Crete is calling...answer in style with a stay at the glamorous The Royal Blue Resort & Spa, one of the finest five-star resorts on the island. The resort is spectacularly located on a hillside, covering over 70 acres of perfectly kept gardens and offering guests access to an exclusive private beach with all the creature comforts, including sunbeds and umbrellas. Spend your time lazing by the main pools, which offer breathtaking views over the sea, practising your swing on the two tennis courts, being pampered at the blissful spa, and wining and dining at the eight restaurants and bars.

Set among lush gardens above the blue waters of the Sea of Crete, The Royal Blue Resort & Spa lies on the northern coast of Crete, right next to a quaint fishing village called Panormos. This picturesque village will give you a true taste of life on the island: picture cobbled streets lined with boutique shops and Greek tavernas surrounded by tiny coves with sandy beaches.

vendor_name: Minos Ambassador - Adults only
title: Crete Five-Star Adults-Only Boho Suites in Rethymno with Daily Breakfast, Nightly Dinner & Guaranteed Room Upgrade
description: Between the shaded terraces of Rethymno’s famed old town and the shining Aegean Sea, Minos Ambassador Suites & Spa offers adults-only boho chic-inspired five-star luxury steeped in Crete’s spectacular spirit. After days spent lazing on Rethymnon Beach’s golden sands or exploring the town’s arched doorways and sun-drenched stone staircases, return to classic Mediterranean plates at onsite restaurant Ella, moments of quiet indulgence at the hotel’s sprawling Wellness Spa Centre or rooftop cocktails basking in the magnificent setting sun at Sunset Lobby Bar.
offer_address: Kanakaki Yianni & Lefteri 1, Rethymno, Crete 74133, Greece

Stay in high-end island style and indulge with daily breakfast, nightly dinner, a complimentary bottle of wine on arrival, welcome water and fruit basket, and a complimentary 'Tasty Corner' filled with daily lunch snacks for the kids.

A member of Accor's acclaimed MGallery Hotel Collection with interiors inspired by Crete’s iconic vistas, this stylish sanctuary, positioned in the heart of historic Agios Nikolaos, offers the perfect base for savouring everything great about the island. Return from exploring to Mediterranean delights celebrating the traditional Cretan diet at Mira Restaurant or classic cocktails and magnificent views at Théa Pool Bar, the perfect place to soak up the island’s extraordinary splendour as twilight descends.

vendor_name: Cayo Exclusive Resort & Spa
title: Tranquil Crete Private Pool Retreat with Daily Breakfast & Nightly Dinner

Be transported to an island explorer’s dream with a stay in Crete's picturesque village of Plaka, overlooking Spinalonga Island.

Situated near the popular tourist spot, Elounda, you'll find uninterrupted bliss within moments of arriving: unwind beside the glimmering split-level infinity pool with a cocktail in hand, or uncover new levels of rejuvenation with a tailored treatment at Armonia Spa.

Relish gastronomic greatness at the resort’s eateries, set against a picture-perfect Greek island backdrop, before calling it a day in adorned rooms, each with a private pool. Wake up to the gentle sounds of the Aegean Sea as the sun rises, promising another day of serene discovery.

vendor_name: St Nicolas Bay Resort Hotel and Villas

description:
Leave the world behind and escape to the striking Greek Island of Crete, staying at St. Nicolas Bay Resort Hotel & Villas, a luxurious sanctuary nestled on a private cove on the eastern side of the island. Treat yourself to a sun-kissed escape at this five-star oasis, part of the Small Luxury Hotels of the World and offering guests direct access to the waters of the Aegean Sea from a private bay, elegant rooms and suites and state-of-the-art facilities.

Your dreamy escape includes daily breakfast, nightly buffet dinners, a bottle of wine on arrival with fresh fruit and a cocktail at the glamorous bar during your stay. Plus, children aged 11 years and under stay free.

Kissed by sunshine, embraced by gently swaying tamarisk trees and surrounded by endless views of the dazzling Mediterranean Sea, this haven is perfectly placed for exploring the Greek island's southern coast. Splash in sky-blue waters on Crete’s longest beach, explore Ottoman-era alleyways and fountains in Ierapetra’s Old Town and savour the region’s stunningly soulful scenery. By night, sample the resort's restaurants and bars: Menoa for sumptuous Peruvian-Asian-inspired dishes, Mare Mare bar for ice-cold poolside ouzo and Tamarisk for fresh fish.

vendor_name: Minos Beach Art Hotel
title: Crete Five-Star Art-Inspired Oasis Overlooking Mirabello Bay with Two Private Beaches
description:
Greek island opulence awaits at Minos Beach Art Hotel, a chic five-star Crete oasis overlooking the glistening waterfront of Mirabello Bay. Adorned with a wealth of contemporary art and a façade of fuchsia blooms, this architectural retreat (part of the prestigious Design Hotels collections) balances minimalist design with maximum luxury. This is an ultra-modern oasis softening 2.5 kilometres of rugged Cretan coastline through its elegant assembly of waterfront accommodation and picturesque gardens.

When you're not plunging into the sun-kissed ocean or sipping cocktails at the beachfront bar, choose to bask in the Greek heat on one of two private beaches or escape the rays with a stroll around the hotel's open-air art museum. Nourish your soul with authentic food and wine across three exceptional restaurants and indulge in a daily Kafeneion pick-me-up at the traditional coffee shop before curating your day in paradise. The onsite dive centre offers an array of activities for the adventurous, from windsurfing to waterskiing, while the wellness spa promises absolute bliss for those seeking relaxation.

Explore the charming coastal town of Agios Nikolaos, or venture further afield to Archanes, renowned for its vineyards and olive groves. Return to your tranquil base and take a dip in two glittering infinity pools which appear to merge harmoniously with the bay beyond, or simply savour a refreshing beverage at the hotel's onsite bars.

With each villa boasting unrivalled privacy and breathtaking views over Crete, it's the perfect way to soak up the island's natural splendour.

Savour farm-to-table cuisine at the Argo Restaurant, savour craft cocktails and fresh coffee at Argo Pool Bar, or head out on the complimentary shuttle to the resort's own private beach club for watersports or seaside drinks. Ready to unwind? Melt away with a therapeutic session at Elixir Spa. Venture out to explore the charming fishing village of Elounda, or visit the historic town of Agios Nikolaos, renowned for its vibrant nightlife and picturesque lake.

Days are full of outdoor recreation, while evenings delight with live music and magnificent sunsets on the resort's private beach.

Marvel at the classic Grecian architecture surrounding the resort or take in the historic white-washed churches in the nearby village of Gouves. Explore the vibrant waterfront restaurants and shops or take a trip further afield to ancient ruins and archaeological museums, ideal for learning about the rich history of this Mediterranean paradise.
